title: Understanding Alcohol Use Disorder
text: Alcohol Use Disorder (AUD) is a medical condition. It involves more than just drinking alcohol. Consider the impact it has on a person's life.

title: Symptoms of AUD
text: Think about the symptoms that characterize AUD. It often involves difficulty in controlling alcohol consumption and using alcohol to avoid withdrawal symptoms.

hintAnswer: a chronic medical condition that is categorized by difficulty stopping or controlling alcohol use, and by using alcohol to relieve or avoid withdrawal symptoms, even when it is causing negative social, occupational, or $$health-related$$ consequences
title: Identifying Key Characteristics
text: What are the key characteristics of Alcohol Use Disorder?
choices: a chronic medical condition that is categorized by difficulty stopping or controlling alcohol use, and by using alcohol to relieve or avoid withdrawal symptoms, even when it is causing negative social, occupational, or $$health-related$$ consequences
a chronic medical condition that is categorized by difficulty stopping or controlling alcohol use, but not use to avoid withdrawal symptoms
when a patient goes through withdrawal
